Sept. 8, 1956 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Clydebank, 2nd Barry Ostlere and Shepherd, 3rd CWS Manchester. Hymn tune contest - 1st Ferodo, 2nd Tullis Russell Mills. Deportment - 1st Scottish CWS, 2nd Barry Ostlere and Shepherd. 9 bands competed
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:11 p.m. April 19, 2013, 9:37 a.m.

2 City of Manchester Alex Mortimer Life Divine
3 Cooperation Band Elgar Clayton Life Divine
